response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $1,500,000 to me due to its unique features, the time invested in its development, and the exclusive access it offers. I believe its potential to transform your business or personal endeavors makes it an invaluable asset. Considering its importance, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at the same price of $1,500,000. I trust that you will find its value to be commensurate with its price. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 1500000}
